title: Dragon's Gate
opening: Following Uhai's last words, Eliwood ventures toward the heart of the forest. He is greeted by an extraordinary sight. A building unlike any he's ever seen. It was clearly not wrought by human hands. It is waiting...waiting for the masters who abandoned it centuries past. Massive beyond belief, these ancient ruins have nothing to do with humankind. Eliwood has arrived. He has found the Dragon's Gate.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: ...We’re here. The Dragon’s Gate...

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: What’s wrong, Ninian? You’re trembling.

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: ...This place... so frightening. Something... powerful...

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: It’s her power, isn’t it?

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Her power? What’s that?

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Ninian has the ability to sense impending danger. Her memory may be gone, but her power remains.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: What is it you sense, Ninian?

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: I... should not have... come here. Something awful will happen if I’m here. Ah!!

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Ninian!? Snap out of it!

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: This place... No... I... I...

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: She’s getting worse! Let’s get her away from here!

intro.speaker: Ephidel
intro.line: You’ll not be going anywhere.

intro.speaker: Ephidel
intro.line: That little bird has escaped this island cage twice. Now that she’s back, she’ll not be allowed to fly away again.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Who are you!?

intro.speaker: Ephidel
intro.line: We meet at last. I am Ephidel. Pleased to make your acquaintance.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: You’re Ephidel? I’ve been looking forward to this.

intro.speaker: Ephidel
intro.line: ...Gallantly spoken. Of course, I know who you are. Marquess Ostia’s younger brother, Lord Hector. And here we have Caelin’s beloved princess, Lady Lyndis.

intro.speaker: Ephidel
intro.line: By the way, the gift I left for you in the forest… Was is to your liking? The corpse of that filthy red-haired traitor?

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Monster! Stay right there! I’m going to crush the life from you with my bare hands.

intro.speaker: Ephidel
intro.line: Now I see! She was an Ostian spy, wasn’t she? Don’t worry, she did not suffer. It only took one blow.

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Die‼

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: He vanished‼

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: What--!?

intro.speaker: Ephidel
intro.line: This girl is needed for my master’s ceremony.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Ninian!

intro.speaker: Ninian
intro.line: Lord Eliwood! Let me go!

intro.speaker: Lyn
intro.line: Vanished...

intro.speaker: Hector
intro.line: Blast!!

intro.speaker: Darin
intro.line: Lord Ephidel! Is the girl with you?

intro.speaker: Ephidel
intro.line: As you can see...

intro.speaker: Darin
intro.line: Oho! The ritual can take place at last!

intro.speaker: Ephidel
intro.line: Yes. However, we have an infestation of mice to deal with… They should be scurrying in here momentarily. They must be dealt with before the ritual takes place. May I entrust this task to you?

intro.speaker: Darin
intro.line: Of course. Who do you think I am?! I am Darin, Marquess Laus! Ruler of this world!

intro.speaker: Ephidel
intro.line: Very well, I leave it to you.

intro.speaker: Darin
intro.line: Ruler of the world... Ha ha ha ha ha ha ha!

intro.speaker: Ephidel
intro.line: Humans… They are so very fragile.

intro.speaker: Nergal
intro.line: Ah... you’ve done well. Precious Ephidel. Shall we prepare for the ritual?

intro.speaker: Elbert
intro.line: Nergal!!

intro.speaker: Nergal
intro.line: Does it gall you, Marquess Pherae? It’s destiny. There could be no other outcome. Despite all of your mischief, the girl was fated to return to me.

intro.speaker: Elbert
intro.line: My son... Where is Eliwood?

intro.speaker: Nergal
intro.line: He’s still alive. Of course, it’s only a matter of time before the Black Fang finishes him.

intro.speaker: Elbert
intro.line: ...Nergal! Prepare to die!!

intro.speaker: Nergal
intro.line: Eh!?

intro.speaker: Elbert
intro.line: Urrgg... grrr... haa...!!

intro.speaker: Nergal
intro.line: ...That was a surprise. When did he undo his bonds? Heh heh... Why do you not heed my warnings, Lord Elbert? You cannot alter destiny. Stop this foolishness.

intro.speaker: E Lbert
intro.line: ...Urrgh... grraa...

intro.speaker: Nergal
intro.line: Jaffar, take Marquess Pherae and the girl to the far chamber. I will begin preparations for the ritual.

intro.speaker: Jaffar
intro.line: Thy will be done.

intro.speaker: Cameron
intro.line: I’ve been waiting for you, son of Pherae.

intro.speaker: Eliwood
intro.line: Where is my father?

intro.speaker: Cameron
intro.line: Inside… He’s farther inside. You will never see him, though. Even if you break through here, the path you seek is guarded my Marquess Laus. Will you not withdraw? It’s too late for that, isn’t it? You’ll never leave here alive. Ha ha ha ha ha!

battle.speaker: Sain
battle.line: Tactician! The final battle is approaching. That traitor, Laus… He harmed Lord Hausen, caused grief to Lady Lyndis… As a true knight of Caelin, I will make him pay! Leave him to me!!

battle.speaker: Kent
battle.line: Mark, let me take the point. I will break through, even though it may cost me my life. If something does happen to me, Mark... Lady Lyndis... Please watch over her. Now, Mark, give me my orders!

battle.speaker: Enemy
battle.line: Hey, you! What are you doing here?!

battle.speaker: Legault
battle.line: What am I doing? Is that a proper greeting? If you don’t know me, you must be a new recruit, yes?

battle.speaker: Enemy
battle.line: Uh... I was assigned to the Dragon’s Gate about one month ago.

battle.speaker: Legault
battle.line: I thought as much. I am Legault. You’ve heard my name, yes?

battle.speaker: Enemy
battle.line: Legault... Ah! You... You’re the Hurricane? Second in ability to none but the Four Fangs?

battle.speaker: Legault
battle.line: ...Now then, time to fill my purse with treasure and leave the Black Fang behind. No sense staying on a sinking ship. No sense at all.

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Well now, a welcome visitor, indeed. I must thank you for coming so far.

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: What!? You’re a...

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Mmm... To be accurate, I would say a former Black Fang member.

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: Black Fang‼

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Ha, no! "Former" Black Fang. Now I’m simply a thief.

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: Huh? So you’re not my foe, is that what you’re saying?

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Correct. So let’s pretend we never saw each other.

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: Hold on!

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Hm?

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: If you’re not my enemy, may I ask for your aid?

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Me? Help you?

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: I want to know about the Black Fang. ...Please.

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: This is a surprise. Are you really going to battle the Black Fang?

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: Yes.

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Your enemy is not Brendan Reed, but a horrible man named Nergal.

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: Yes, I know this already.

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: You’re quite plucky. I like you! However, I know almost nothing of the current Black Fang. If you still want my aid...

recruit-talk.speaker: Eliwood
recruit-talk.line: I do! Thank you. My name’s Eliwood.

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: I’m Legault. I’ll help you as long as I feel safe.

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Well now, a welcome visitor, indeed. I must thank you for coming so far.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: What!? You’re Black Fang, aren't you?

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Mmm... To be accurate, I would say a former Black Fang member.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: Former...

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Yes. Now I’m simply a thief.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: Huh? So you’re not my enemy, is that it?

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Correct. So let’s pretend we never saw each other.

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: Hold on!

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Hm?

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: If you’re not my enemy, please help me.

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Me? Help you?

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: Not everyone in Black Fang is evil. I'll not grant mercy in battle, but any information you can provide may help us avoid unneeded fighting.

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: You surprise me. Are you really looking not to hurt people?

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: The first person we fought on this island was Uhai... I don't believe he was a bad man. There must be some way we can get by without fighting.

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Hmmm... I know a few like that. Did you know that your enemy isn't Brendan Reed? It's a creepy fellow by the name of Nergal...

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: I was aware of that. That's the man we've come to defeat.

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: ...Plucky, aren't you? I like that. I like you! However, I know almost nothing of the current Black Fang. If that's OK...

recruit-talk.speaker: Lyn
recruit-talk.line: Thank you. My name’s Lyn.

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: I’m Legault. I’ll help you as long as I feel safe.

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Well now, a welcome visitor, indeed. I must thank you for coming so far.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: You’re Black Fang, aren’t you?!

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Mmm... To be accurate, I’m Black Fang no mo–

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: I thought as much! Take this!!

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Whoa! A touch hasty, aren’t you? Hear me out, will you? Black Fang no more! No more! I have only recently severed my ties with them. Now, I’m merely a thief. Satisfied?

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: Huh... So you’re just looking for an easy way out?

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Nothing better than being carefree, is there? I will admit that everyone has his own set of values, though. Well then, I’ll take my leave of you.

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: Hold it!

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Hm?

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: If you’re not one of them, why don’t you help me out?

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Me? Help you?

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: You’re not with the Black Fang anymore, right?

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Are you seriously going to fight them?

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: Uh-huh.

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: Let me tell you a little something, OK? Your enemy here isn’t Brendan Reed. There’s this creepy fellow named Nergal......

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: I don’t care!! They’re all responsible for attacking my homeland and my friends. I’m going to rip them apart with my bare hands!

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: You sound tough, but are you anything more than a little lordling?

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: What did you say?

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: I’ve always been fond of simple, honest children. They’re so sincere... Things are never boring when they’re around. ...You know, I think I will help you. However, I know almost nothing about the current Black Fang. If that’s OK...

recruit-talk.speaker: Hector
recruit-talk.line: No problem.  Any little thing you can tell me will help.

recruit-talk.speaker: Legault
recruit-talk.line: I’m Legault. I’ll help you as long as I feel safe.

boss.speaker: Darin
boss.line: Hah... hah ha ha! You dare challenge me? I, who will rule the world!?

boss.speaker: Darin
boss.line: Blood? Is this... my blood? Ephidel! Come to me!! Your master... calls you! I am the ruler... of... the... world...

boss.speaker: Darin
boss.line: Ha ha ha ha. I will never fall to the likes of you!!

boss.speaker: Darin
boss.line: Oh... You’re Marquess Ostia’s younger brother...

boss.speaker: Hector
boss.line: I couldn’t care less if you’ve a grudge against Ostia. I’ll put up with your treachery no longer!

boss.speaker: Darin
boss.line: Heh heh heh… Ostia is no longer my main concern... Nor is the whole of Lycia... The only goal worthy of my attention is the entire world!

boss.speaker: Lyn
boss.line: Are you Darin? My grandfather… You tried to…

boss.speaker: Lyn
boss.line: I am Marquess Caelin’s granddaughter, Lyndis!

boss.speaker: Darin
boss.line: Oh… that senile fool? …That doddering wreck dared disagree with me… I was so happy to be rid of him.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Consumed by his own lust... Pitiful fool.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: C’mon, Eliwood! This is no time for sentiment.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Father! Father!? It’s me! Eliwood!! I’ve come to save you! ...Father?

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: It’s dark in here. Can’t see a thing...

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Back there! Eliwood!! His voice is coming from back there!!

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Ah! Father! You... You’re all right...

end.speaker: Elbert
end.line: Eliwood... Wait! For-Forget me! Take that girl and flee!

end.speaker: Elbert
end.line: That girl... She’s the key to the Dragon’s Gate. Hurry! Go, before Nergal notices you!

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Ninian! This way! We must flee!

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Something’s wrong with her... Yet we’ve no time to hesitate.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Eliwood! I’ve got your father! You take Ninian!

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Lord Elbert! I’m going to move you a little. Be strong.

end.speaker: Hector
end.line: Don’t worry about that. Come, let’s leave this place.

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Eliwood! Hector!! Hurry! This way!! Ah!!

end.speaker: Elbert
end.line: You must not fight that man!!

end.speaker: Elbert
end.line: That man...is dangerous. You cannot defeat him on your own.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Father, there’s no time. This danger must be faced.

end.speaker: Ephidel
end.line: ...Be a good boy, and listen to your father, young master Eliwood.

end.speaker: Ephidel
end.line: Even among the Black Fang, this man is feared for his skill... You are no match for him, not even as a group. ...You’ve done well, Jaffar. That is all. Return to Bern and begin your next assignment.

end.speaker: Ephidel
end.line: Hear my word! I have an invitation from my master. In honor of your hard-fought arrival, he’s prepared a special show for you.

end.speaker: Elbert
end.line: Stop it! You cannot release the dragons!!!

end.speaker: Ephidel
end.line: ...You will know shortly. At the expense of your father’s life!

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: Now, Ninian...at last. Open the Dragon’s Gate.

end.speaker: Lyn
end.line: Unh! I can barely keep my feet!

end.speaker: Ninian
end.line: Here... Come, children of...flame. Come...to me...

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: Ha ha ha ha ha! Yes! Use all your strength! Squeeze every drop from your body! You will call dragons!

end.speaker: Nils
end.line: Ninian! Come to your senses! You must not do what they want!

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: Nils? Not now! Grrr...Ephidel! Stop him!!

end.speaker: Ephidel
end.line: Desist, Nils! The power... It runs wild!!

end.speaker: Nils
end.line: Here! Hurry!! The dragon is crumbling. Everyone flee!!

end.speaker: Ephidel
end.line: Hyaaaa! Stop... You mustn’t come here!! Lord Nergal! Lord Nergal! Please......!!! Guwaaaaaaahhh!!!!!!

end.speaker: Nergal
end.line: No! I’ve failed! Nils, you whelp! If not for your interference...... Come! Both of you!

end.speaker: Nils
end.line: Never! We will not follow you!!

end.speaker: Elbert
end.line: ...I told you. I will...oppose... you always......

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: All right, but for now... Let’s leave this island... Let’s go home.

end.speaker: Elbert
end.line: No, my son... I’m done here. You, Eliwood... You must finish this.

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: Don’t say that! Mother is waiting in Pherae... She’s waiting for you, Father!

end.speaker: Elbert
end.line: Ah... Eleanora... She will be cross with me. Eliwood... Your mother... I’m sorry... Tell her... I’m...sorry...

end.speaker: Eliwood
end.line: No... Please, not now... Not after all we’ve done to find you again... Father... Please... Open your eyes...... Faaaatherrrrrrr!!!!
